pinMenuMessageLabel.message: Bandika kiendelezi kutoka kwa menyu ya mafumbo hapo juu.
pinMenuMessageLabel.description: Pin the extension from puzzle menu above.

mainWelcomeHeading.message: Toa maandishi kutoka kwa ukurasa/pdf yoyote kwenye mtandao
mainWelcomeHeading.description: Extract text from any page/pdf on the internet

littleInfoLabel.message: Picha iliyopigwa kwa OCR (Utambuaji wa Tabia ya Macho).
littleInfoLabel.description: Image taken for OCR (Optical Character Recognition).

pdfDragInfoLabel.message: Buruta 'n' dondosha baadhi ya faili hapa, au ubofye ili kuchagua faili.
pdfDragInfoLabel.description: Drag 'n' drop some files here, or click to select files.

littleInfoPdfLabel.message: Pdf imechukuliwa kwa OCR (Utambuaji wa Tabia ya Macho).
littleInfoPdfLabel.description: Pdf taken for OCR (Optical Character Recognition).

extractTextFromImageLabel.message: Toa Maandishi kutoka kwa picha hii

uploadPdfLabel.message: pakia pdf ili kutoa maandishi kutoka
uploadPdfLabel.description: upload pdf to extract text from

appDescription.message: Programu ya kuchanganua hati ya haraka na rahisi yenye maandishi ya hali ya juu.
appDescription.description: A Fast and simple document scanner app with high quality text output.

subHeadOne.message: Changanua Picha kutoka kwa folda yako au Mtandao.
subHeadOne.description: Scan Image from your folder or Internet.

subHeadOneDesc.message: Changanua Picha kwenye ukurasa wowote wa wavuti [kwa kutumia kiendelezi cha kivinjari chetu] kwenye mtandao au pakia picha yako kwenye tovuti yetu ili kupata maandishi kwa kutumia teknolojia yetu ya usahihi zaidi ya OCR.
subHeadOneDesc.description: Do Image scan on any webpage [using our browser extenion] on the internet or uplaod your image on our website to get text using our best accuracy OCR technology.

subHeadTwoDesc.message: Inaauni lugha 100+ na vibadala vyake. Changanua hati ya lugha yoyote na upate Maandishi kwa kutumia programu yetu ya Picha hadi Maandishi (OCR).
subHeadTwoDesc.description: Supports 100+ language and its variants. Scan document of any language and get Text using our Image to Text (OCR) app.

headF1Desc.message: Bofya kwenye chaguo "pakia pdf kufanya OCR" kutoka kwa menyu ya muktadha kufanya uchanganuzi wa Hati kwenye Pdf na upate Maandishi.
headF1Desc.description: Click on the option "upload pdf to do OCR" from context menu to do Document scan on Pdfs and get Text.

headF2Desc.message: Bofya kwenye ikoni ya kiendelezi kutoka kwa Kipunguza skrini kitaonekana. kisha Bofya kwenye kitufe cha +, skrini iliyopunguzwa itachanganuliwa na utapata Maandishi.
headF2Desc.description: Click on the extension icon from Screen cropper will appear. then Click on the + button, cropped screen will be scanned and you will get the Text.

headF3Desc.message: Cheza Maandishi ya OCR kwa kutumia Maandishi yetu hadi Teknolojia ya Kuzungumza. Tafsiri Maandishi ya OCR katika lugha yoyote unayotaka.
headF3Desc.description: Play the the OCR Text using our Text to Speech Technology. Translate OCR Text in any language you want.
